name: tatsurou
normalized: …aah.
a silent sigh.
it joins the wind blowing on the hill.
if only the refreshing breeze could also blow off my sadness.
lying on the meadow, i'm mindlessly staring at the drifting clouds.
as one could expect, i'm still depressed.
at times like this, i usually come to this place.
only me and a few others know about it.
a secret spot where the whole landscapeerupts in bloom when the season arrives.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'm the only one who wasn't selected…
right now, yukikaze and rinko-ane are probably still in the middleof the strategy meeting concerning the mission.
of course, they are full-fledged taimanin.
in contrast, i'm just――
i couldn't do anything during the mission besidessticking to those two.
you could even say the enemiesnever even registered my presence.

name: tatsurou
normalized: the perfect ninja.
even though i can't use ninpou.
ahaha.
the chuckle dies in my throat.
i'm used to this sense of self-loathing.
born the heir of the akiyama house, a spectacular disappointment.
that's me, akiyama tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: even yukikaze must be disgusted with me.
can you blame her?
i'm just a good-for-nothing after all.
despite being childhood friends, there's a great gap between us.
it's common knowledge that yukikaze is also from a renowed family.
for generations, the mizuki family has been producing many"thunder arts" practitioners.
yukikaze's deceased father was also an expert.
as the name goes, the "thunder arts" is based onlightning manipulation.
of all the ninja arts, it boasts the highest level of firepower.
and it is said that yukikaze is its strongest user in recent memory.
because her outflow is too intense,she employs custom-made guns as catalysts for her ability.
those so-called "lightning shooters" are no weapons,but limiters made to control her overwhelming might.
and now, yukikaze is being taught how to reachperfect control without their help.
the next generation's ace, no doubt about it.
i always thought i wanted to become a manthat could be a match for her.
well, i still haven't made any progress.

name: tatsurou
normalized: the chasm between us is so wide…haa.
i sigh again.

name: yukikaze
normalized: of course you'd be here!
suddenly, the blue sky is replaced by yukikaze's face.
one of the few who know of this place.

name: yukikaze
normalized: and still lying down too!
come on, get up!
yukikaze calls out to me with her hands on her waist.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hm, aah…
i sluggishly get off the ground and move to a standing position.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's with that 『hm, aah…』!
you need to get rid of this habit of getting depressed all the time.
girls hate that!
yukikaze's tone is cheerful as usual.
her deeply tanned face.
she hasn't changed a bit since we were kids.
right now, i can't bear to look at that face.
when did this happen?
at some point, it became impossiblefor me to tell her my honest feelings.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah, yeah…who cares…
another thing that never changed is her sharp tongue.

name: yukikaze
normalized: don't sulk!
the mission this time is suited for kunoichi.
asagi-sensei said it too!

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, that's right but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: then it should be obvious.
you're not a kunoichi after all, tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: kunoichi aside, i'm still the only one that didn't make it.
it has to be because i wasn't up to the task during the mission.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ooh, so that's what's on your mind?
yukikaze stares in surprise after hearing that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: neither me nor rinko-senpai ever thought of tatsurou as a burden.

name: tatsurou
normalized: so i'm just an extra?
i frown inadvertently.

name: yukikaze
normalized: isn't being an extra fine?
it's the best position to witness our accomplishments from, right?

name: yukikaze
normalized: you see, it's only because you're next to me and rinkothat your skills looks terrible, so you shouldn't worry about it!
after all, she and i are amazing!
after being struck dumb for a while,

name: tatsurou
normalized: you… you want to cheer me up orjust kick me when i'm already down?

name: yukikaze
normalized: cheer you up!
yukikaze says so with great assurance.
yep, no trace of irony here.
she's really trying to raise my spirit with this.
is that optimism?
dopiness?
or genius?

name: yukikaze
normalized: so?
you feel better now, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah, yeah, i feel grand, miss amazing.
now if i could witness some more of miss amazing's wonderful ninpou,i would surely be lifted to heaven.

name: yukikaze
normalized: grr!
what's with all the sarcasm?!
even though i went to the trouble of being so mindful!
yukikaze puffs out her cheeks.
miss amazing got mad.
even like this, she sure is cute.
i'm the only one that get to see this side of her.
despite appearances, she's deeply shy of strangers;at school 「yes」, 「thanks」, 「understood」,are the extent of her conversations with the other boys.
therefore, guys find it hard to approach her,and she ended up being known as the cool and talented beauty.
seeing this particular yukikaze is the childhood friend's privilege.
as i am staring at her face absentmindedly,yukikaze's rising embarrassment causes her to start blushing.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what is it…

name: tatsurou
normalized: ha!
no, it's nothing.

name: yukikaze
normalized: lies.
you were thinking about something while staring at me.
what were you thinking about?
she's waiting for my answerwith some sort of expectations in her eyes.

name: tatsurou
normalized: no, well, if the guys at school were to discover that part of you,you'd be even more popular…something like that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh?
yukikaze displays a blank look for a momentbefore raising her eyebrows sternly.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what are you implying?!
you'd be happy if i waspopular with the other boys, tatsurou…?
there's an edge in her voice.
i meant it as an indirect praise,but it seems all i managed to do is to anger her.

name: tatsurou
normalized: no…i-it's not what i said…

name: yukikaze
normalized: then what did you mean?!
i really hate how you can't speak your mind clearly!
yukikaze folds her arms while glaring at me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hurry up and spit it out.
what were you thinking while lookingat my face?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ha, no…like i said

name: yukikaze
normalized: enough with those 『ha, no』 and 『like i said』!

name: tatsurou
normalized: a-alright.
what i wanted to say is,the usual yukikaze i know of is, err…cute, and that is good…
somehow i get really embarrassed and start mumbling midway.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hauu…
yukikaze will be yukikaze.
now she's the one turning red and fidgeting.

name: yukikaze
normalized: o-oh…you think i'm cute…tatsurou said i'm cute…

name: tatsurou
normalized: …i never said it before ?
yukikaze vigorously nods her head at my hesitating inquiry.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it's the first time i've heard that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i see…i always thought…so.

name: yukikaze
normalized: o-okay…thank you.
we both stop looking at each other.
as we are both bashfully looking at our feet,the conversation dies down.
err, isn't it the right mood for something?
like embracing her?
ki-kissing her?
heart thumping, i start reaching out towards yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey…
she suddenly resumes speaking

name: tatsurou
normalized: w-what!?
jarred, i let my arms fall to my side.

name: yukikaze
normalized: do you remember our first kiss?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eeh!?
surprised at how she seemed to read my mind,i let out a shrill sound.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you forgot?
yukikaze shoots me a threatening glare.

name: tatsurou
normalized: n-no…
the question took me by surprise, but i firmly remember it
we were kids, and still honest with our feelings at the time.
when we learned about the word kiss,we started putting it into practice as childs do.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i remember.
it became quite a big deal after rinko-ane walked in on us.
at that, yukikaze's face lights up.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes!
she was like"you two are smooching each other and leaving me out alone!

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah yes, she was so mad.

name: yukikaze
normalized: then rinko-senpai and tatsurou kissed,me and rinko-senpai kissed.
by the end our mouths were all sticky.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's right.
it makes me nostalgic.

name: yukikaze
normalized: we really were kids.

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, we were really small.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i know right?
teehee.
that special memory make us share a chuckle.
after it tapers off, yukikaze let out a sigh.

name: yukikaze
normalized: shall we do it now?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
you mean…
yukikaze's unexpected proposal immediatelysends my heart into overdrive.

name: yukikaze
normalized: a kiss.
now.
yukikaze takes the lead.
before i could notice, her body became very close.
her scarlet face raises toward mine.

name: yukikaze
normalized: no good?
you don't want to?

name: tatsurou
normalized: n-no, that's not it…if i'm enough for you…then…

name: yukikaze
normalized: close your eyes…
yukikaze whispers while looking away shyly.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes.
i obey.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'll zap you if they open…

name: yukikaze
normalized: …mh
a tender sensation on my lips.
her sweet fragrance fills my nose.
my second kiss with yukikaze.
but since it's not child's play anymore, this is our first true kiss.
time seems to dilate around us.
ultimately, her scent drifts away from me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you can open your eyes now.
a redder-than-ever yukikaze reappears in front of me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i don't kiss boys i hate.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes.

name: yukikaze
normalized: so, you get what i'm saying!

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes.
even a blockhead like me understandshow yukikaze wants me to answer.
but i dont have the courage needed yet,so i gently grasp her hand instead.
though i might have disappointed her again,she's clasping my hand back.
we stay like that for a while, simply silent.
but given my relationship with yukikaze up until now,the pleasant mood is plenty good enough.

name: tatsurou
normalized: by the way, this mission suited for kunoichi, what is it about?

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh?
…y-yes.
that's…
yukikaze is taken aback, her eyes darting away awkwardly.
her unusually stiff expression seems to say『i can't tell.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, sorry!
the mission's details shouldn't be divulged.

name: yukikaze
normalized: y-yes…right.
we're disguising as some women.
that kind of stuff.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i see.
that's why it was impossible for me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes…
maybe because she feels bad about me being rejected,her tone sounds apologetic.
to salvage the mood, i opt to tell her now what i decided.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you know, i was thinking i wanted yukikaze to depend on me more.
so i'm considering applying for the next "special camp".

name: yukikaze
normalized: really!?
her eyes shift to me again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yup.
i nod to her exclamation of surprise.
special camp" is basically a sort of prep school.
separated from the academy's normal curriculum,you could say it's a special training to form the elites.
it is held once a year.
the recruitment to the special camp is made by competitiveexamination.
every year a lot of determined students apply.
for taimanin seeking to become part of the elite,it's often thought of as the high road to success.
both yukikaze and rinko managed to get selected by age 13,and graduated from it with honors.
in my case…well, it goes without saying.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i see.
tatsurou also wants to attempt enrolling in special camp.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes, i'll pass the examination and become a trainee for sure.

name: tatsurou
normalized: then, once my skills are sharpened,i think i'll be able to find a way to helpyou rescue your mother.

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou!
that makes me very happy!
yukikaze looks as happy as i am.

name: tatsurou
normalized: so, do your best on the mission.
i'll also be working hard.

name: yukikaze
normalized: thank you, tatsurou!
i'll definitely do my best to rescue mother!
yukikaze nods vigorously, then seems to falter a bit.

name: yukikaze
normalized: s-so, about that mission we were talking about…

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes?

name: yukikaze
normalized: for the mission, we are supposed to…
she tries to add something, glancing on and off at me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is it fine to tell me?
yukikaze's only answer is to bite her lip.
somehow, she's different from usual.
could it be she's feeling the pressure of the sheathed mission?

name: tatsurou
normalized: is there something?

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes.
sorry, i can't talk about it after all.
forget about it!
yukikaze shakes off her doubts with a smile.

name: yukikaze
normalized: alright, let's go!

name: tatsurou
normalized: what?
to where?

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm hungry!
let's go to inageya!

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, aah…well alright then.
the sudden change of subject leave me a bit puzzled.
inageya is a cafe located at the center of the hidden village.
it has become a place of relaxation for the girls attending gosha.
their speciality is a take-away shiratama anmitsu,a dessert and favorite of yukikaze's.
the owner, an old woman called inage,is said to have been a feared master of time honored,kunoichi-like bedroom arts, but it might just be rumors.

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou!
let's go eat anmitsu!
come on, anmitsu!
she slaps my shoulders while saying so,back to her usual self.
